tachyon.worker.block

Class BlockLockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.block.BlockLockManager

  • public final class BlockLockManager
extends Object
    Handle all block locks.

    This class is thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlockLockManager()
      Creates a new instance of BlockLockManager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int blockHashIndex(long blockId)
      Gets index of the lock that will be used to lock the block.
      void cleanupSession(long sessionId)
      Cleans up the locks currently hold by a specific session.
      Set<Long> getLockedBlocks()
      Gets a set of currently locked blocks.
      long lockBlock(long sessionId, long blockId, BlockLockType blockLockType)
      Locks a block.
      void unlockBlock(long lockId)
      Releases the lock with the specified lock id.

      Releases the lock with the specified session and block id.
      void validateLock(long sessionId, long blockId, long lockId)
      Validates the lock is hold by the given session for the given block.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlockLockManager

        public BlockLockManager()
        Creates a new instance of BlockLockManager.

    • Method Detail

      • blockHashIndex

        public static int blockHashIndex(long blockId)
        Gets index of the lock that will be used to lock the block.
        Parameters:
        blockId - the id of the block
        Returns:
        hash index of the lock

      • lockBlock

        public long lockBlock(long sessionId,
                      long blockId,
                      BlockLockType blockLockType)
        Locks a block. Note that, lock striping is used so even this block does not exist, a lock id is still returned.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id
        blockId - the block id
        blockLockType - BlockLockType.READ or BlockLockType.WRITE
        Returns:
        lock id

      • unlockBlock

        public void unlockBlock(long lockId)
                 throws BlockDoesNotExistException
        Releases the lock with the specified lock id.
        Parameters:
        lockId - the id of the lock to release
        Throws:
        BlockDoesNotExistException - if lock id cannot be found

      • unlockBlock

        public void unlockBlock(long sessionId,
                        long blockId)
                 throws BlockDoesNotExistException
        Releases the lock with the specified session and block id.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id
        blockId - the block id
        Throws:
        BlockDoesNotExistException - if the block id cannot be found

      • validateLock

        public void validateLock(long sessionId,
                         long blockId,
                         long lockId)
                  throws BlockDoesNotExistException,
                         InvalidWorkerStateException
        Validates the lock is hold by the given session for the given block.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id
        blockId - the block id
        lockId - the lock id
        Throws:
        BlockDoesNotExistException - when no lock record can be found for lockId
        InvalidWorkerStateException - when sessionId or blockId is not consistent with that in the lock record for lockId

      • cleanupSession

        public void cleanupSession(long sessionId)
        Cleans up the locks currently hold by a specific session.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the id of the session to cleanup

      • getLockedBlocks

        public Set<Long> getLockedBlocks()
        Gets a set of currently locked blocks.
        Returns:
        a set of locked blocks
